title: Raspberry topped sponge cakes
description: This recipe makes 12 mini cakes which are perfect for special occasions or afternoon tea, but if you prefer you can make one large cake instead.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 12 cup mini sandwich tin, a blender and a piping bag.
serves: Makes 12 mini cakes or 1 large cake
ingredients: 250ml/9fl oz double cream, whipped until stiff
